titleStmt.title: Description of Benjamin Zucker Family Ketubah Collection, KET Z225: Ketubah, 1923-1932.

notesStmt.note: Dimensions for the document currently unattainable.
The dating of the document is based on the years in which Menorah, the German Jewish monthly journal that published this ketubbah, was in press.
See: Sabar, Shalom. Ketubbah: Jewish Marriage Contracts of the Hebrew Union College Skirball Museum and Klau Library. Philadelphia & New York: Jewish Publication Society, 1990. p. 294.

msContents.textLang: Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE), Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE); Hebrew
